definition: contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: A new topology to realize square wave inversion is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种方波逆变器的新拓扑。

sentences.english: We present a novel current-following SPWM inverter with delay-loop control.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一种滞环控制的电流跟踪型SPWM逆变器。

sentences.english: We improved arithmetics of Mercator mapping transform and inverse transform.
sentences.chinese: 改进了墨卡托变换与逆变换算法。

sentences.english: Three-level inverters were widely used in medium-voltage high-power domain.
sentences.chinese: 三电平逆变器在中压大功率场合得到了广泛的应用。

sentences.english: This thesis first builded up the loss model of inverter with different modulation methods.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先建立了逆变器不同调制方式下的损耗模型。

sentences.english: Finally, the output image can be obtained through inverse wavelet transform.
sentences.chinese: 最后利用小波逆变换重构融合图像。

sentences.english: In the first, the paper presents the current situation and development trends of the inverters .
sentences.chinese: 本文首先介绍了逆变电源的发展现状及趋势。

sentences.english: A full introduction to covariance and contravariance would take too long.
sentences.chinese: 对协变与逆变的完整介绍要花很长时间。

sentences.english: This method is suitable for a non-PWM inverter system.
sentences.chinese: 本方法也适用于不调宽逆变器系统的计算。

sentences.english: Finally the fusion image was obtained by taking inverse wavelet transform.
sentences.chinese: 最后经过小波逆变换得到融合图像。

sentences.english: The manufacturer says itspact design makes the inverters easier to install and service.
sentences.chinese: 制造商说，小巧的设计使得在逆变器易于安装和维修。

sentences.english: IGBT in verter high running frequency, high efficiency, low noise.
sentences.chinese: IGBT逆变工作频率高，高效，低噪音。

sentences.english: A large-signal nonlinear model is created to simulate the system dynamic response.
sentences.chinese: 因此，建立了弧焊逆变电源的大信号非线性模型。

sentences.english: Rectifer part and inverter part contruct the paper.
sentences.chinese: 课题主要可分为整流和逆变两部分。

sentences.english: A power supply is connected to a line connecting the rectifier with the inverter.
sentences.chinese: 电源联接到整流器和逆变器的连接线上。

sentences.english: Microprocessor is used to realize the Pulse Frequence Modulation(PFM) control of the inverter.
sentences.chinese: 用单片机对半桥逆变器进行PFM控制。

definition: to rectify (alternating current to direct current)
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
